וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> ve-Shem And the name הָאֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chad of the other אֱלִיעֶ֑זֶר <S%H461><s%> 'e-li-'E-zer; [was] Eliezer כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei for the God אָבִי֙ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi of my father בְּעֶזְרִ֔י <S%H5828><s%> be-'ez-Ri, [said he was] mine help וַיַּצִּלֵ֖נִי <S%H5337><s%> vai-yatz-tzi-Le-ni and delivered מֵחֶ֥רֶב <S%H2719><s%> me-Che-rev me from the sword פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh. of Pharaoh
